actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act in order to increase the authorization for the Alaska village demonstration projects.

summary.text: Increases the authorization, under the Federal Water Pollution Control Act, for the Alaska village demonstration projects from $2,000,000 to $3,500,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act in order to increase the authorization for the Alaska village demonstration projects.
